properties.Name_of_Sp: At the boundary of the Sankuharwatta Upper Division
properties.Observatio: The area where the springs are located and the catchpit are completely covered with grass. A water scheme using this spring is already underway. There are no boundaries are not marked. This area may be about  30 perches of which about 30% are large trees
properties.Descriptio:
Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 
1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed 
seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m grid interval
